Name: The Playful Brain: The Surprising Science of How Puzzles Improve Your Mind

ReviewList.Text: This book will provide hours of challenges to keep one sharp.  The best part is that almost all sections can be used to sharpen your wits again and again, and even help you to improve your thinking and quickness.

Excellent understandable content with a good variety of mental exercises that encompass all the many complex functions of the brain.  It will enhance, compliment and contribute to any level of physical workout resulting in a complete body/mind program, as well as to your overall well being and daily life.

If your family thinks you spend too much time lolly-gagging around doing puzzles, this is the book for you!  Any puzzle lover will enjoy it.  Read about how different types of puzzles do different things for your thinking.  Especially interesting to me was Chapter 8 - Time: Clock Time vs. Brain Time - where I got some amazing insight into why I am always late!!!  Challenging puzzles sprinkled throughout the book.  I want to actually buy this book so that I can write in it and solve the puzzles!

The author takes you step by step through how the brain functions, not only what it does and how it does it, but how you as an individual can use this knowledge to improve your brain.  It works!.  Do the exercises, play the games and it will happen for you as well as it did me.

This is a very stimulating book on both levels: theoretical neurological concepts and practical challenges and games to implement these concepts. I’d love to see more books written by multi-disciplined teams.
PROVEN EXERCISES TO HELP A SERIOUS STUDENT IMPROVE BRAIN-PERFORMANCE AND AVOID DEMENTIA AND ALZIEMER'S DISEASE. A prescription from one of the world's leading Neuroscientists.
The two authors work well together, and the reading material and puzzles are both food for thought and great exercise for the brain.  I feel smarter today!
It explains how and what part of your brain puzzles stimulate plus gives said puzzles. I highly recommend it for anyone trying to improve their mind.
I liked the book because of the great variety of puzzles thus giving the different parts of the brain a workout. The puzzles are entertaining too.
I find my memory is going as I age. The book actually is helping restore some of my abilities. It actually does what it says!
THis is one of the best books that we have found on this subject.  It should be a school textbook.
